content: size 9-12 months 1-2 years 2-3 years 3-4 years 4-5 years 5-6 years 6-8 years 8-10 years measurements length 29 31 33 35 41 43 45 47 cm / 11 4 12 2 13 13 75 16 1 17 17 7 18 5 inches bust circumference 60 64 66 72 76 80 83 86 cm / 23 6 25 2 26 28 3 30 31 5 32 7 33 9 inches pattern information abros cardigan is worked from top to bottom in brioche the neck ribbing is worked on 3 mm needles the rest of the jacket is worked on 4 mm needles increases are done every 8th round by 16 sts every time to fit with the brioche pattern the yoke and the body is worked back and forth while the sleeves are worked in rounds on double pointed needles or using magic loop the cardigan is just as good for everyday wear as it is for parties
